title: Subchapter A - Life, Accident and Health Insurance
content:
Subchapter A - Life, Accident and Health Insurance

State Regulations

Part 38 -  (§ 38.0 to 38.9)

Part 39 - Minimum Standards For The New York State Partnership For Long-term Care Program (§ 39.0 to 39.8)

Part 40 - Group Annuity Contracts And Funding Agreements: Disclosure And Withdrawal Rules (§ 40.0 to 40.6)

Part 41 - Accelerated Payment Of The Death Benefit Under A Life Insurance Policy (§ 41.1 to 41.9)

Part 43 - Individual Life Insurance Market-value Adjustment (§ 43.0 to 43.11)

Part 49 - Fraternal Benefit Societies (§ 49.1 to 49.4)

Part 53 - Life And Annuity Cost Disclosure And Sales Illustrations (Subpart 53-1 to 53-3)

Part 54 - Variable Life Insurance (§ 54.1 to 54.14)

Part 55 - Notice To Employees Concerning Termination Of Group And Health Insurance Policies (§ 55.1 to 55.2)

Part 59 - Minimum Standards For The Form, Content And Sale Of Group And Blanket Insurance Certificates Deemed To Have Been Delivered In This State Pursuant To Section 3201(b) Of The Insurance Law (§ 59.0 to 59.8)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 38 - [Effective 7/1/2025] (§ 38.0 to 38.9)
